definition: zookeeper/stockman/breeder (of livestock, dogs or poultry etc)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: In the United States, there are breeders who raise and sell burros .
sentences.chinese: 在美国，有饲养并贩卖驴子的饲养员。

sentences.english: One of Tai Shan's caretakers and a veterinarian from the Washington National Zoo are expected to accompany them on the journey.
sentences.chinese: 泰山的一个饲养员和一名兽医希望在旅途中陪伴泰山。

sentences.english: The colts and calves are gambolling round the stockman.
sentences.chinese: 小马驹和小牛犊围着饲养员欢蹦乱跳。

sentences.english: They decided to raise it from one to two meters high.
sentences.chinese: 饲养员们决定将围栏的高度由原来的1米加到2米。

sentences.english: Her handlers think it's likely that she lost her other three flippers to a shark.
sentences.chinese: 她的饲养员认为鲨鱼咬断了她另三只鳍。

sentences.english: In this image, a feeder weighs the cub during a physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图中，饲养员在体检过程中给幼崽称重。

sentences.english: The stockman is spreading a great quantity of fish food into the fish pond.
sentences.chinese: 饲养员正在往鱼塘里撒喂大量鱼食。

sentences.english: I'm now a horse keeper at the stud farm.
sentences.chinese: 我现在是种马场的饲养员。

sentences.english: Breeders in the Charolles vicinity established a herd book in 1882.
sentences.chinese: 在沙罗勒附近饲养员在1882年建立了一个群书。

sentences.english: Vets and breeders also get the e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 兽医和动物饲养员也将收到电子邮件。

sentences.english: But how he can pass the test, it has been doing the breeder.
sentences.chinese: 但是他怎么也考不上，所以一直做着饲养员。

sentences.english: This golden monkey is a normal "spoony male", introduced the feeder.
sentences.chinese: 据饲养员介绍，这只金丝猴是个标准的“痴情男”。

sentences.english: A keeper brushes a hippo's teeth at the Shanghai Zoo November 3, 2010.
sentences.chinese: 在上海动物园，一位饲养员正在为河马刷牙。

sentences.english: The feeder fed new feed to pigs so that they laid on fresh.
sentences.chinese: 饲养员用新饲料喂猪好让它们长肉。

sentences.english: Daniel, you are indeed a very responsible horse keeper.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你这饲养员可真是当得尽心尽职啊。
